component.description: The ECH Echelle Spectrograph Model Package

abstract.p:
The ECH package consists of a set of routines which model the behaviour of the UCL coude echelle spectrograph (UCLES) and of echelle spectrographs of similar design. Such spectrographs can differ in focal length (which is in fact irrelevant to the model package), cross-dispersing-prism apex angle, echelle ruling frequency, echelle blaze angle, and camera focal length.
It is not capable of dealing with spectrographs which differ in any more major ways from UCLES, although it could be extended to do so should the need arise.
